content: Worked as intended, however the notification about turning on locations is unnecessary when the app isn't even being used or when you're not checked in on a public space that requires you to scan. Also, one problem I find annoying is you can't pair your phone number with your e-mail account if you had accidentally registered an account for each of them. E-mail and phone number both became separate accounts. I hope there will be a fix for this. I trust the devs would improve the app overtime

At last, the newest apps for tracing covid-19 in Indonesia, now it is possible to trace the pandemic within country or at least in the city. Unfortunately, the record on public places visitors does not accurate. For example it's showing 1400 visitors at the time but i look inside and it's just around 100 including staffs. So, the management of apps must applied auto check-out on user end.

Useless, very unreliable. There are lots of bugs unresolved. I input the correct info on my ID card but it does not want to continue to the next step. I input data for my e-hac, the data was not the same on the confirmation page no matter how many time repeated. Frustrating!

Insists that my phone is rooted when its not. Cant use it at all. Edit: after a few months they release a new update. I still get similar but different error message "invalid signature" when login/signup with either email or phone number. Still cant use this at all when at the same time it is mandatory to access some areas in indonesia. Truly frustrating.

Not user-friendly, moreover to elders and please fix that because this app is mandatory. It's really hard to put the date of birth because the issue is when we already chose the right year, month, and date and click it, the date is not appeared. It happened for several items, and because we cannot fix it manually I need to found another way of copy paste the date to the column. Also OTP that sometimes didn't send directly and already expired once we recieved it.

it's so inconvenience that it demands the users to let the app Always use the location or it wont let us use it, while it drained a lot of batery life yet it's not really necessary to run the app on background. n it's pretty SUCKS that sometimes the location of the app is error n i have to reopen the app or turn off then turn on again my location etc jst to get the location of the app works n it took A LOT OF time. hope u can fix it. thanks

The QR Code Scan feature didn't work as intended. The app keep telling to turn on the location service even if it's already active at the first place. The date of birth dialogue also didn't update it's text field, so it's gonna be empty no matter what date I try to pick. As for a workaround, I had to write my date of birth manually in other app (such as messaging) that has a text field by following the date format in this app, copy/cut that, and paste it into the date of birth text field.

Gives error about 'lokasi buatan' and won't run, but my phone is not rooted, I've turned off Developer Options, and I'm not running any apps that might do this. If there's a problem then give us more info (what has been detected) or tell us how to fix it. Advice from 119 was to use a different phone! Update - I tried to send the screenshot to that email address as asked and got an error, mail not sent because the mail box is 'Over quota'. You guys need to empty your email inbox... (actually, I tried send that exact thing two days before you asked and had the same error...)

The application often bugs, when I'm filling in the date of birth, the application won't enter the date. And I don't think it's effective because the date can't be entered manually by typing and also can not be filled automatically. The app often bugs in other parts and that's annoying. Suggestions for developers to fix the application immediately because this is one of the community facilities that are needed and used now -_-

The battery drain because it requires the app to access location all the time is real. I have to keep switching off this feature so my phone doesn't die and then having to change the setting again before using the app to check in to places. Quite annoying.

My previous rate was deleted by the developer. Google please remove this horrible app from playstore. Our government can't make proper app for covid contact tracing. Oftenly crash. The app suck our battery. Too many trash features. You don't have to add many features. It suppose to be only for vaccine, and contact tracing. Minimize the app. And this app doesn't have any network security. Means all of your data exposed.

Now that this app usage is mandatory for daily activities, please remove constant location tracking permission. It's frustrating that i need to disable location permission after check-in or check-out in public places, or my devices battery could drain rapidly. I know you can't fix the millions of data breach a while ago, but at least you can change the location permission.

Unfortunately this app is just as good as how the developer wants it and not much real use for the user. At least this app should also be able to show zonation condition other than where the person is, i.e. for travel planning. Also this app works strictly by phone number and cant change number through the app, worst for those who have helped others registered for getting vacination using their phone, their own certificate might not show up. The manual way to make correction is hit and miss.

still the same as in the previous version, you could say there are no changes in this latest version. on my use with android version 9 it always fails in the registration window in the verification session which should be received via SMS, but which is received via email. And the verification number received via email, trying to input it always fails, it's been tried more than 3x. September 30, 2021 time 10:53

On android phone, first time using this app works fine, but the second time onwards the notification to allow location (which I've already turned on) cannot be skipped or bypassed. My mom, who also uses an android phone, is also having the same problems. Please fix, thank you.

The problem lies not with the apps, there's indeed some improvement to make, such ease to check what risk on a particular area instead of around you. However, the true problem lies in how the government indirectly force you to download the app, unless you can live without buying groceries.

Need to improve the app. I cant place identity number even i tried it all the time. The setting of date, month and year of birth...better using dropdown..your setting right now really takes time to find the year. I cant imagine when old people who born in 1940 should press that arrow almost 1000x

The app is working ok. However there is no support available. In some cases the data changes (the phone no changes, the name is not the same) caused the verification problem. Tried to contact through phone, email and ig but no response. And we are required to use this app to have access to public area and services. Please do answer cause we need help to rectify and solve the problem. Thank you.

I already input my name and ID number correctly and yet, the app still saying to put the correct ID and Name, what the hell is wrong with your app?! If you can't make a good app, at least don't released it until it's work properly! Now i can't even go inside a mall because i can't use the scanner! also it's full of bugs and doesn't work properly when needed! FIX THE DAMN APP!!

After input data regarding viewing vaccine certificate, application goes back to the way it was. Unable to view vaccine certififate from the app. Also when the app is connected to wifi, it will just keep on loading. However, it does not happen when it is connected to mobile data.

The app is running fine untill somehow the app forced close it self and made me scan in again at the place i worked. And after that day i can not log out of the place and can not log in again the day after and it has been for a week since. Funny when i can not log in to the place i work everyday. So for now 1 star it is. Because the error is too fatal.

My 2nd vaccination was 3 months ago and yet there's no certificate for my vaccination. I've tried to call 119 and also tried some of their recommendation but its still not appear in this apps. I'm truly disappointed for this issue. I mean what's the purpose of this apps if the certificate isnt appear on this apps. Please fix the bug or at least work as a team between hospital and this apps to fix this issue bcuz its annoying

The app failed to read the QR code, so i restarted my phone but the problem remained. I also tried uninstalling and reinstalling but to no avail. When logging in, it just wouldn't show the main page of the app, but always brings me back to the login page. Frustrating experience. Pls fix this problem.

I don't know what is going on with the server in this app. But, I can't login even I received OTP Code via email and phone number. My connection is good either. Also, I can't click "check in" to enter the supermarket. I wish this problem will be fixed by developer ASAP.

This apps is power hunger and battery drain apps, it force you to use apps in aplication in background, and activate gps to track whereever you are. It literally force to know where you are, and with last data leak from the very similiar apps, i literally can't trust to give much permission to this apps. While it's good for vaccines passport, if the t&c still waiving the responsibility of data leak, well, i think you need to make either apps only have access when you use this apps not always

I Can't Complete my profil. Many time to repeat connect and complete The Name and Register Number, but doesn't work, the app said : match your data, and then i think must send email to PeduliLindungi, but still doesn't got the reason and solution for the problem. Good think for program but Bad execution, lets clean up.

DON'T DOWNLOAD THIS APP it's super shady. Just use their website on chrome and use incognito mode to download your vaccine certificate. This apps is collecting location, user content (which unnecessary), search history (for what exactly?), identifiers, and also browsing history (wth they want to do with our browsing history data that contains our ibank, email, and our private/personal data) i even have the screenshot prove of the app trying to access. PeduliLindungi, your app is SUPER SUS

All previous reviews are true. And It's got a very annoying all time location permission, late and delayed loading for viewing information, constant notification on that status bar, what the heck? Also sms verification never works. This app sucks!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

1. High impact to the phone : draining battery, more heat, and phone running very slow, because all time GPS running in the background system consume more power and signal. 2. some of indonesian Airport (eg. Balikpapan and Gororontalo) only use the old e-hac app. (separately app) for check-in post, make confuse..

Poor apps, asking unnecessary access to photos, vids, location, messaging etc. Unreliable, crashed a lot. Battery consuming. Admin failed to respond towards complaints. My vaccine certificate still not showing, unable to comple profile (Birthday date field unable to fill) failed to send sms verification multiple times. Is zero star possible?

It bugs quite often, there was that one time where the application suddenly went off and when I re-opened it, my account has been logged out. I was going to enter a place that needed to scan too, it was bad.

This app is trash. It doesn't remember that I already authorized all permission from location, camera, etc. It keeps aksing for permission everytime I want to scan QR Code in public places and have to open my email or SMS for OTP. It is very stressful and took a lot of time. If you want to make this app mandatory, make it easier to use and more professional. Instead you annoy people by having to use this app because you are incompetent to create one.

I cant register for vaccination because each time I submit the otp it always give internal server error. The otp also never received in my phone message, but in email, even though in the app it says the otp is sent via phone number. Please fix this user experience cause its really terrible. You can drop some unnecessary functional in this app and focus more on the most used one, cause lot of people complaint about it and you seems dont know which you should be focusing on for fixing this app

I am trying to use this on a Samsung Note 20. Every time I click Mulai the privacy statement comes up. When I touch the screen it goes back to the start screen. One complete circle without being able to start the program. Not to mention the problems of confirming my vaccine from the USA.

This apps just wasted my time by asking to type in the data, but it seems the apps not connected. It's sometimes hard to type in as the keyboard dominate the screen. It seems that this apps is not ready to use. Very dissaponting

I don't want my apps killing my battery and tracking my every move, the app can work just fine with "location permissions while I am using the app", so one star until the app works with less permissions. It is actually a good app and the idea behind it could indeed prove usefull but it consumes too much of my battery as it access my location 24/7.

The apps very slow to respond. When we log in the apps, click X button to close the checkin page, click checkout, and after restart the phone very slow respond. Please fix it, because this apps is mandatory to use, everything must be fast and ready, dont be the obstacle.

This app is not update. I've got my second vaccine but it doesn't tell so. I sent few emails but CS never replies, almost 1 month. Calling Call Center doesn't help neither, only connect to machine! And my covid status is -sometimes- green and suddenly changes to Yellow. That's not helping to travel at all!!

Well, since i need to use commuter line, i re-install the app and i can use it. I just hope the check-out feature could be imposed as check-in. And would appreciate if it's possible to only use the location while using the app, bcause the app can't work normal if i chose that option. We must use the location all the time and it's not good for the battery. Thank you

app is so intrusive that it ALWAYS wants to access GPS location > will drain battery aswell while running in background. currently you can't use it if you choose 'only allow access gps when app is opened' in app permission. also it will annoy you with notification if you turn your GPS off. so much for indonesian app.

The verification process depends on the registration staff at clinic/hospital when you got vaxed. I've got vaxed, registered, and got certificate in app. But suddenly another name and ID appeared in my app because maybe that other person wrote my number as his/her or the staff input wrong number in registration. Either way, you can't do anything about that kind of mistake through this app. The hotline can only said just wait until that other person realizes the problem and make correction.

I dont know why people complain about this app, this app saves lives and it is not complicated at all. A little bit of hassle, but everything is straightforward and easy to complete. The only annoying bit is login through email, as the keyboard somehow blocked the fill-in-box. The rest, is easy. You just have to think abit more to complete and use this app.

One of the worst apps I ever experienced. Crashes all the time. Goes haywire with location settings. When relogging just removes prior actions. Get this sorted out! This app is too crucial to deliver poor UI/UX!

Fail in registering even when trying again and again. After uninstall and re install for the 3rd time, it was successfull but keep asking the location even after the location was on. Very very annoying, please improve the application before make it mandatory to access to public area

Poor apps. 1. Drain batteries. 2. Very ineffective system in inputting date of birth (if you were born in 1975, you have to scroll back 540 times from year 2021 until it shows 1975). And now I've been clicking it for more than 2000 times, and still keep fail to input the date because of some unknown error. 3. Keep logging out incidentally 4. Today it can't be opened at all in my cellphone

it seems the system is not ready to accept changes from the applicant, every time the input data is updated, the response is always long and ends with an error. not good at anticipating receiving the latest data. Not reliable

Useless ,after installing its not working at all. You can just only install but cnt do anything with it. 👎 And after changing my device its only working for Warganagara indonesia,,there is option for orang asing but u can not click. And its been so many months nothing has been done to improve it. And i dnt no who design it, but when u go to the feature of your date and year of birth ,u have to do it manually from 2021 to your birth year,so irritating.

I cant verify my account because the app did not send any email containing the code, i have tried to refresh gmail and the app many times but there is still no email containing the 6 digit verification code Now that i have fixed this problem and actually logged in, the app gives me another bug where the certificate does show up, but i cant open it

The app is bad since it is inconsistent and difficult to change your status. I was quarantined and had my pcr tests done with negative result and also uploaded my vaccine papers and yet still reflected as red for my status. Contacted both Peduli Lindungi hotline and Menkes. Menkes didnt even have a single operator. Until.now i cant change my status and unable to go to most public spaces since they depend on this app. Please either fix your app or get better hotline operators. This is bad.

It updates almost every week but no improvements at all. The QR scanner in the app is still bugging and sometimes can't be read even though using a regular QR scanner it can be scanned easily. Stop updating if it's no use!

It's my second review. I write this because the developer asks me to email my complain in the first review including the screenshot about the problem I have faced when using this app. It's bothersome to email when I clearly said in my first review that my problem is the app's slow enough to detect my location when I need the location correctly to scan QR code before entering KRL station. Can't they read? Just make sure the app can accommodate when thousands of user is using it at the same time.

The app now allows for other nationalities to register their passport. But somehow a countrycode is put in front of the digits entered and the last three fall off. Existingvaccination records are not recognized as a consequence. Please fix this bug, terima kasih

Cannot change birthday data.. it keeps blank after we select a certain date. Oke birthday problem is solved by manually copas text from other texting app such as whatsapp. Another problem is not solved yet is, when you take picture for profile pic, after you save it, then voila, it dissapear again...

this app requires user to allow access to user's location at all times, otherwise user can't use the app at all. all while the govt mandate the use of this app if you want to access many public places such as mall, public transportation stations, even workplaces. this is a major breach of user's privacy and to think that they use taxpayers' money to fund this rubbish app is a slap in the face for us taxpayers. my suggestion: give users choice to allow location access only when needed.

Cmon...please improve this garbage mapping system. You have to turn on turn off the data otherwise you will stuck in somewhere else. And you can not log in into certain places. Takes me 25-30min to resolve this whenever I try to use this apps. -1000

I can't check-in anywhere, even though when I tested the internet connection the results were stable. Thank you for this I can't go to the place that ordered the scan pedulilindungi, yes, almost everywhere

Useless. No solution for foreigners whatsoever. Not only it's considered a breach of privacy, lil thing is too damn difficult to manage. First, it's not in english. I've emailed them, no response nor solutions at all. What the hell do you guys want us to do?? Showing our vaccination cards SHOULD BE ENOUGH

Messy UI, VERY MESSY. Important infos such as vaccine certificate went on the way behind many options. It should be on main page where people are usually asked to show their vaccine certificate to people. Login took longer that it supposed to be, and im not even sure whats the other purpose of this app beside showing certificate, tracking people movement and even pribate datas.

I don't know why, sometime I could not check in, and it was at the important momments, annoying, huh...? Re-tried, re-tried, again and again, and after I allmost got hopeless, it can. But still, it was annoying, everytime I use this app. Sorry...

It's always asking to activated the gps, why can't you just make the app using the gps when we're using it, very battery consuming.. and it always asked to restart my device to remove the notification even though i've already restarted it several times, the pop up notification still there, it's so annoying..

It is a very helpful app but please consider to change location permission from 'Allow all the time' to 'Allow only while using the app'. It is a battery drain and I suppose this app doesn't need to track my movement 24 hours a day.

Vaccine e-cert not working, application drained battery by acessing the location all the time (what for?). Scanning QR location creating ridiculous queue on the destination which can be locked by the drainerbatt-apps GPS locator. And this apps in beta version forced to handle production for millions ppl? Where is the server location anyway? cloud in Indonesia? Or SG? 😄 I prefer using the website model than apps like this.

Works as well as it can for an Indonesian developed app for Indonesians but for international visitors it is a nightmare. Hope you fix this up as it causes a lot of unnecessary anxiousness for people who are not Indonesian and have a need to travel and use this app. Why is e-hac not available as a downloadable form at least from the website?

I like the idea of this app, but this is a very bad app. Very unstable. I just did an antigen test several days ago, but it showed the result of the test only for a few days. Several times I could not check in to the place I visited because it said: out of range though I was exactly in front of the gate and QR code and many peoples experienced the same problem with me

Unnecessarily have statistics which don't update at all. Moreover, what kind of "permission" if I don't get to choose what I permit (ehem, u rly need my location 24/7?). Totally limits my privacy choice, and I don't trust the data's safety. Also draining battery. DON'T TELL ME TO TURN ON LIFE SAVING MODE ON MY PHONE. You, developers and government, are the one who needs to accept the fact that we don't want to share our location at all time! Anw hope more public place requires this app to enter

I have tried so many times to input my number perfectly based on my Indonesian identity card, and yet it still deosn't work at all. Hopefully you could fix this problem, in order to edit and login the personal account of the user. 🙏🙏thank you.

Sometimes its work well, sometimes no. Cant login user not found happens many times even you already an user and logged in before. So i can say this app is not stable yet. Perhaps the server load is too high. Also the user interface was not designed well. NIK asked is several parts while the the user already input NIK in profile. As this app is nation wide user coverage so it should handles by proper team with professional ability.

This app often has countless number of errors like not being able to scan the QR code properly. My account somehow gets lost a lot of times and I have to type my e-mail and my NIC number repeatedly. Overall, this app is too slow and not efficient.

I just uninstall the application. It's always error when I open it. And I can't access the location. Please fix it before many people use it. I had three times instal and uninstall it and always same. So now I won't use it again. It' drain my battery too.

Force you to keep the gps on all the time, if not the app will display annoying notification and it can't be swiped. This app suppose to make us convenient when travelling outside not to annoy us. Respect our privacy.

I know where this app wants to go, but the execution is very bad. Sometimes when i want to check in or check out it said that my session has expired and i have to log in back, but when i want to log in, there is a sign "user not found". What the hell, i don't care i just go home without doing check out, peace. Tell me when this app going better ✌🏻

Too slow in process but very quick in out of the apps, so you have to open the apps several time. You also to insert your NIK every time you want to open your vaccine Certificate. Not practical/friendly use. Others are great.

userName: A normal person not an alien
content: The login process for this app is too complicated, and the OTP code for login usually came late for me. That's why I could only use my email for login. I reinstalled this app too many times and after 5 or 6 times, I managed to login using my verified phone number. During that time, I couldn't download my vaccine's certificate since the website is just as unhelpful as the app. The costumer service of this app is unhelpful too since I emailed them too many times, they didn't responded all of it.

Seriously, the quality and consistency of this app have to be enhanced. I have updated my both jabs and have appeared in the app, but the result of my vaccination are back to "RED" instead of "GREEN". What's wrong with the IT team? Be smart and updated. Do not ruin someone's life because of your own mistake. Please!

My phone's temperature always hot after i installed this aplication. Almost every 2 hour "Power Consumption Peduli Lindungi" used too much power notification appear. Recently i head the news about data breach. So i didnt find the positive side of this application

Execution is really bad, out of 5 days a week for work, i can only use it for 1-2 days. Whenever i want to check in it just says that the radius is too far, whats the use of using gps all the time if the gps is not even working? I've restarted(on off) my gps several times, and has no prob with other gps application, but my gps in this app is just stuck somewhere else. Can't you add a button that refreshes your location like in google maps? That way i can refresh my location manually.

Overall a very disappointing app from the government, there are so many errors that i experienced that if i make a list about it, it will easily surpass 1000 words. Some of these errors include = A. An error that prevents me from entering my birthdate B. Statistics takes a very long time to load C. The vaccine certificate won't appear (i'm already vaxxed twice) And many other errors that i would probably encounter later. Please fix this app, JAKI does a better job than this app.

V. V. Poor. Until now, the system shows wrong passport no although i keep keying in the correct one. In another page, it says second vaccination done, but vaksin sertficate page says, check your data . Also, ut cannot capture the date of birth . At a total loss what to do.

Collect to many data, some of it not necessary for covid tracking, background location tracking, you can't use the app if you chose "allow location access only while using the app" you must chose allow all the time to use the app.

My vaccination certificate hadn't been updated in the apps from Aug 23 2021 till now. The apps dont function well. Even the contact email address of the developer is erroneous. It is indeed desperate for the users who experience things like me.

GPS permission is draining battery, and the app won't open to the main screen if i choose to allow location permission only while using the app, fix this bcz not every user want to allow location permission all the time. And there is no settings menu?

There's a lot af problem in this app. Slow loading at home screen, date picker at birth date when filling user profile is not user friendly. I recommend that user can select year and month rather than only select month for the birth date, user must re-fill the application form when user fill up NIK and birth date before email. Please Fix this ASAP.

We got 3 options for the location privacy setting but we really just can choose one, the always on. What's the point then? It only drains our battery and do more harm than good. For a mandatory app, it's sucks. Please fix it.

Between the constantly annoying updates, slow response, and disjointed connection with other tracking apps (eHAC); this app is a necessary evil to have. Please fix it, unless being BUMN sponsored app is an excuse for a mediocre product.

Cant get rid of that thing on notification, and always need location permission, its battery consuming, i dont like this app. edit : it seems you dont know what i mean I dont want the app to always need my location , it's annoying.

After update to a new one, the vacation Sertivicate don't appear. And always have to input NIK, still the data didn't show up. How come the important application, like this!

u want review.. i reviewed for nearly 500 words how ineffective and inefficient this apps so far based on mobile data/available connection, constant need to tract the user location, the size of the app which u can reduce to make it more simple and easier to use since there are many useless things u added to make the interface looks good.. and u deleted my review? nice to know.. just suggestion, if u take review as offense, better make the app in "early access" mode so no one can leave the review

Permission akses lokasi saya set "hanya sewaktu digunakan" dan tidak bisa buka aplikasinya,padahal gps sudah saya nyalakan. maunya minta akses lokasi "selalu nyala"...benerin dong..agak ganggu ya..saya pakai galaxy note 9

Untuk pembuat aplikasi ini tolong diperbaiki, untuk di Android sangat menguras baterai, lokasi harus selalu diaktifkan tidak bisa saat aplikasi berjalan. Membuat baterai boros dan buat Hp menjadi panas. Test running Android 11.
Loading nya lama babget. Ada keterangan sudah vaksin 2 kali dan hijau, giliran klik sertifikat vaksin malah eror mulu. Bikin greget mau ngantri masuk mall jadi ngurusin certifucat 1 jam loading.

Setelah scan QR code di supermarket, akun saya logout dan sulit masuk login kembali. Setelah bisa login, sertifikat vaksinnya hilang namun statusnya alhamdulillah tertulis sudah vaksin kedua. Tapi kenapa sertifikatnya malah hilang. Sungguh aneh.
Eror terus gimana nih. Waktu coba masuk, Kode dikrm ke email/sms tapi app langsung stop. berkali2 begitu..jd ga bs masuk2. Sdh uninstall Juga tetep gitu

Tidak bisa" login.. sekarang kemana" harus pakai aplikasi pedulilindungi tp aplikasinya sendiri banyak bug dan tdk bisa login baik dengan hp ataupun email. Tolong diperbaiki jika memang mewajibkan masyarakat menggunakan aplikasi ini..

bosss... pakk bukkkk..... sudah vaksin gak otomatis statusnya berubah .solusinya gmna ? kirimi email ? ahhhhsudah lahhh.... vaksin gak vaksin jadi percuma .gak bisa menikmati fasilitas umum ,cuman gara2 gak punya aplikasi pedulilindungi . laknaaaatttt... smoga sehat selalu kalian dan keluarga kalian .

Aplikasi tidak sesuai dengan kondisi sebenarnya. Status di peduli lindungi berwarna hitam, sedangkan hari itu saya baru saja swab antigen dan di paspor digital appsnya tertera keterangan hasil negatif.

Blm bisa diakses melalui Gojek, juga Tokopedia. Notifnya, diminta utk menggunakan nama dan NIK yg sesuai. Dan ternyata di saya coba langsung di app ini, juga muncul notif yg sama.... Nah, lho... Ada nih dg PL????
App ini kacau. Saya tidak dapat lengkapi data profile di tanggal lahir. Udah install uninstall refresh, you name it. Gak bisa ke update profile saya, alhasil gak bisa scan QR code untuk ke manapun
Tidak perlu always on location, harusnya cukup waktu buka app nya saja. Jadi boros baterai. Dan perbaiki input tahun lahirnya jangan dibuat seperti teks biasa, tolol asli yang bikin designnya goblog

Ini kenapa ya, susah bngt untk dapat Nomor kode Verifikasi, berulang kali minta kirim kode, smpe 1 minggu lebih gk pernah dapat" tolong bantuan Dan infonya dong, untuk kejelasannya, jgn dipersulit Kalo ingin mempermudah

Sertifikat vaksin saya ga muncul2, sudah sampe selesai vaksin kedua tetep ajaa ga munculll. Dan kalo scan barcode di mall, statusnya keluar warning warna merah, "anda tidak bisa mengunjungi lokasi ini". Gituuu, padahal udah vaksin.

Jelek, aplikasi tidak praktis, untuk cek sertifikat vaksin harus isi NIK, mana hapal NIK segitu banyaknya angka, belum lagi isi tanggal ultah harus cari tanggalnya, kebayang yang umur 80 cari ke belakang... Perbaiki jika ingin friendly operation

Setiap kali melengkapi data dan disimpan, masih saja meminta kelengkapan data. Saya coba isi berulang-ulang, yang akhirnya berujung, "Anda sudah melakukan 5 kali percobaan. Mohon coba lagi 30 menit selanjutnya". 😤

Mau registrasi vaksin tulisannya otp dikirim ke nomor hp yg kita input tapi malah di kirim ke email. Begitu dicoba malah otp not match udh 4x gitu terus. Mohon penjelasan dan perbaikannya. Terima kasih

Sudah vaksin ke 2 sertifikat tidak ada di peduli.lindungi. Sudah telp diminta kirim data sudah dilakukan. Sudah email sesuai saran saat telp. Sudah kirim data ulang. Tapi tetap data sertifikat tidak ada. Siapa yang hisa bantu dan tolong atas hal ini. Mohon bantuannya PIC yg bisa bantu. Terimakasih.

saya tidak bisa melengkapi profil saya, sehingga aplikasi tidak bisa digunakan sebagaimana mestinya.. selalu diminta untuk mengisi nama dan nik sesuai ktp, sedangkan saya sudah memastikan bahwa data saya sesuai dengan ktp berkali kali. tetapi tetap saja tidak bisa melengkapi profil. sangat sangat menyebalkan

Saya sudah vaksin dosis ke 1 dan sertifikat vaksin sudah ada di aplikasi PeduliLindungi. Karena vaksinnya AZ, saya harus menunggu vaksin ke 2 awal november. Sebelumnya, sampai dengan 4 hari lalu, status vaksin saya hijau. Tapi tiba-tiba status saya hari ini merah.

Jangan bilang orang gak peduli sama anjuran pemerintah ya.. Aplikasi gw isinya cuma dua halaman doang 1. App info 2. IZINKAN AKSES LOKASI Padahalkan sudah diizinkan... Kagak nambah-nambah tuh halaman.

Data dari yang telah di vaksin tidak lengkap, aplikasi susah digunakan untuk orang tua, dan yang menjadi pertanyaan saya kenapa lokasi harus selalu dinyalakan padahal aplikasi tidak dibuka. Hal ini mengganggu kenyamanan saya

Ada kendala dan lgsung direspon dr pihak pedulilindungi dengan sangat baik.. terimakasih.. untuk saran mohon ditambahkan customer service agar lebih mudah bagi pengguna apabila ada kendala2 saat mengoperasikan aplikasi peduli lindungi ini..

Appnya tidak ada guna, mau daftar saja tidak bisa dengan alasan nomor nik di KTP tidak sama, sedangkan sudah benar2 dimasukkan dan dicoba berkali-kali. Indonesia kalau bikin aplikasi memang tidak pernah berfungsi baik.

Aplikasi itu dibuat untuk mempermudah agar efektif&efisien. Ini proses verifikasi aja hampir 1 jam"&berulang" via sms ga masuk", di coba email juga ga ada perbedaan. Sampai akhirnya keluar notifikasi "coba lg dalam 3 jam". Gila kali suruh nungguin 3 jam cuman buat verifikasi doang!!!???

saran aja..utk scan di mall menurut saya itu bisa saja orang yg positif bisa masuk mall. Karena di aplikasi PL itu tdk ada photonya, jd bisa saja orang yg positif pinjam hp saudaranya atau temannya. mgkin kedepannya di wajibkan ada photo wajah di aplikasi PL.

Aplikasi yang tidak jelas, tidak praktis, malah merepotkan. Data tidak sinkron. Padahal sudah 2x vaksin dan status sudah updated, tapi sertifikat vaksin tidak terdaftar. Mengapa bintang 1? 1. Sebaiknya app bisa menggunakan permision location "only while using app" krn bsa sja membuat boros battery dan juga ini untuk privacy konsumen. Pemerintah pasti gak mau d tuduh memata2i kan? 2. App ini gak berguna, krn d mall atau d tempat mana pun. Security tdak paham, hanya suruh scan, mereka sndiri gak tau apakah yg scan sudah chekin atau belum atau mngkin pura2 aja. Bahkan bsa aja kita pinjam akun org buat cek in. Maka sebaiknya appnya dibenerin atau dihapus aja.

Jujur saya menyukai aplikasi ini. Secara keseluruhan aplikasi ini dapat menjadi pegangan sewaktu-waktu saya lupa membawa sertifikat vaksin atau hal-hal lainnya. Namun yang saat ini sangat mengganggu aktifitas saya adalah live notification yang selalu muncul tanpa adanya pengaturan lain. Hal ini sangat mengganggu aktifitas saya selama menggunakan smartphone. Terlebih smartphone saya di waktu tertentu setiap membuka kunci notifikasi selalu berbunyi. Semoga ini bisa menjadi evaluasi.

Saat ini saya lebih dalam meyakini bahwa Protokol Kesehatan adalah perlengkapan yang disediakan Tuhan untuk umat-Nya, mampu hidup di tengah masa pandemi/melawan penularan Covid 19. Mari berhikmat. Menjalankan Protokol Kesehatan adalah perbuatan baik yang diberkati Tuhan. Perbuatan baik menjaga keutuhan Ciptaan-Nya, kita menyayangi sesama seperti menyayangi diri sendiri. Mari Berbuat Baik. Taat Pakai Masker. Tertib Cuci Tangan. Tetap Jaga Jarak.

Kepada peduli lindungi, mohon untuk update aplikasi, karena banyak yg pakai NIK orang untuk masuk ke tempat2 seperti mall, kantor dan lain nya, mohon di aplikasi ada fitur scan wajah, jadi jika ada yg pakai NIK orang dia mau pakai di hp dia, maka tidak bisa di gunakan, karena teman saya belum vaksin sama sekali dia pakai data dan NIK sodara nya, dan dia bebas keluar masuk tempat seperti mall, kantor, karena petugas di pintu2 hanya cek warna setelah scan doang, mohon di perhatikan itu

Hendaknya kode QR juga mengandung kode untuk kategori lokasi. Misalnya, untuk hotel, yang menginap di hotel, tentu akan masuk setidaknya sampai hari berikutnya. Kalau direset jam 2 pagi, maka jumlahnya jadi tidak akurat. Fasilitas scan QR code untuk check in di lokasi tertentu, seperti Mall, tidak berfungsi pada saat check out dengan pesan: melebihi area check out. Dan ini terjadi pada banyak orang, yang mengakibatkan tracing tidak berfungsi sebagaimana seharusnya. Mohon diperbaiki segera.

Call Ctr 119 ext 9 tidak ada petugas yg melayani. Sebaiknya ada no WA Tim Care Center untuk saluran keluhan² pengguna. Saya coba registrasi vaksinasi dgn NIK & nama sesuai e-KTP. Tapi, tidak bisa lanjut krn keluar respon sbb: "Anda sudah pernah melakukan registrasi vaksinasi COVID-19. Jika Anda merasa belum pernah mendaftarkan diri, segera menghubungi CALL CENTER 119 dgn ext 9. Telpon sekarang". Sudah bisa daftar, tp aplikasi selalu muncul untuk minta izin lokasi (padahal sudah diberi izin), apakah harus dikasih (maksa) semua opsi otomatis jalan dibelakang layar baru bisa lanjut. Pilihannya akhirnya hapus data, baru kembali ke aplikasi selamat datang, dan inout data dan verifikasi lagi buat login. Input tahun lahir pun hanya berdasarkan kalender dan defaulnya dari bulan & tahun skrg, untuk menunju tahun 1980 maka perlu menekan tombil back sebanyak 412x (2021-1980, dikalikan 12 bulan).

Sebenarnya aplikasinya sangat fungsional, tp tolong dong deteksi lokasinya jangan always Karena jika lokasi selalu aktif maka GPS pun akan terus mendeteksi koordinat. Artinya batre bakal terus terkuras meski aplikasi tidak di gunakan. Bahkan ketika kita log out GPS masih mendeteksi. Tolong setidaknya seperti aplikasi cuaca atau pun Google maps, aplikasi tersebut selalu deteksi lokasi tetapi GPS tidak selalu aktif. GPS hanya akan menyala di beberapa kala dengan demikian batre akan lebih awet

1. Muncul notif "Restart handphone anda jika melihat notifikasi ini" terus padahal sudah saya restart 4x nan. . 2. Kode OTP segala dikasih masa berlaku 2 menit doang anjir, sudah gitu ngirim kode OTP nya telat mulu akhirnya auto kadaluarsa. . 3. UX perlu masukan. Sebaiknya ganti label Paspor Digital dengan Sertifikat Vaksin karena ambigu. Arti, istilah dan kegunaan paspor dan sertifikat beda jauh. Menu sertifikat vaksin di sub menu Akun harusnya diletakkan di depan menukar dengan Pendaftaran Vaksin (yg betul Pendaftaran Vaksinasi) sehingga memudahkan user membuka sertifikat,tidak perlu tap terlalu dalam ke sub menu Akun Menu Scan QR code harusnya lebih besar&beda warna supaya user mudah untuk scan

Aplikasi yg nantinya bakal mengkontrol semua aktivitas kita,alih alih karena covid padahal tujuan utamanya ya tadi, Selamat datang di dunia industri 4.0 perlahan tapi pasti.. Nanti juga akan ada yang namanya sosial scoring, semua data akan ditata serapih mungkin untuk meng-integrasi semua kegiatan sosial, transaksi, tracing, dan lain lain. Bagi yang membangkang tentunya pasti ada sanksi. Semua ini tentu didukung jaringan terupdate yaitu 5G. Semua terlaksana berkat aplikasi PELI ini

Adjustment untuk merubah status warna hitam tidak komprehensif. Ketika anjuran 10 hari + 3 sudah dilakukan, kemudian sudah dilakujan tes antigen klinik yang update NAR, di aplikasi terbaca saja namun ga di update status warnanya. Masukan ini buat tim IT developernya nih. Jadi sudah 2 bulan sejak terpapar, sudah isolasi sudah berkali kali negatif, klo patokannya pcr dalam menentukan status di aplikasi, orang medis dan kedokteran saja tidak menjadikan pcr sebagai seseorang sembuh atau belum.

Dear admin. Saya sudah melalui proses yang disampaikan dan saya juga sudah restart HP namun tidak ada perubahan. Padahal di aplikasi mengatakan akan ditampilan selama 30hari kebelakang. Mohon untuk diperiksa system peduli lindunginya. Terima kasih.

beberapa perbaikan yg harus diperhatikan, menurut pandangan saya sebagai engineer. 1. Aplikasi sangat memakan daya, karena selalu memakai GPS setiap waktu, alangkah baiknya jika sedang IDLE memakai lokasi pemancar 2. Proses check in user lebih baik dilakukan oleh penjaga pintu, dgn kata lain, aplikasi ini hanya mengenerate QR code setiap menit saat aplikasi menyala, Dan penjaga pintu mengscan, dgn begitu bisa dilakukan secara offline tanpa perlu internet.

Sudah install, pas mau melengkapi data selalu dibilang nama dan NIK tidak sesuai dgn KTP. Terus saja begitu pdhl data sdh benar. Sudah dicoba utk uninstall dan install ulang, tapi tetap saja hasilnya sama. Bener2 deh, kalau misal aplikasi ini mau dijadikan keharusan dan acuan utk warga berpergian atau masuk ke tempat2 umum, tolong dong diperbaiki kinerjanya. Kok aplikasi yang diharuskan sm pemerintah kacau gini sih. Sekarang bagaimana saya mau pakai aplikasi ini kalau begini caranya..

Applikasi terburuk. NIK saya tiba2 berubah jadi NIK kakak saya. Ketika sy rubah tulisannya tidak sesuai dengan KTP. Saya sudah telfon 119 sampai 3x di hold sampai 25 menit, tetap tidak bisa berubah jg NIK sy sedangkan hari itu sy harus pulang ke JKT dari Mataram menggunakan pesawat. Setiap x telfon sy harus menjelaskan lagi dari awal krn laporan sebelumnya tidak mereka input. Solusi dari mrk tunggu bbrp jam dan telfon lagi sementara pesawat sy bbrp jam lg. Kemudian sambungan telf diputus olehmrk

Database aplikasinya ngga update, ngga sinkron dengan versi desktop/web, karena sertifikat vaksin saya gak muncul di aplikasi tapi ada di versi webnya. Juga terlalu mudah terjadi penyalahgunaan data, modal nama lengkap dan NIK bisa cek punya siapa aja. Disisi lain, proses pengecekan status vaksinasi dan sertifikat vaksin untuk mereka yang (maaf) gak terbiasa dengan gadget dirasa agak menyulitkan. Perlu diingat, ngga semua masyarakat kita menggunakan smartphone.

Ga jelas banget deh, gue dah sebulan lebih vaksin pertama tapi sampe sekarang sertifikat nya kaga keluar juga aneh bgt aplikasi nya kaya gada gunanya percuma bgt pelayanan nya ga bagus, bikin memori penuh, bikin baterai cepet lowbat karena GPS harus selalu aktif haduuuhh gimana sih ini, mau uninstall tapi penting harus pakai ini. Operator nya tolong jangan asal-asalan dong yang detail kerja nya

Aplikasi gaje, udah 2x vaksin dan gaada kontak erat sama orang yg terjangkit covid tiba" status jadi hitam. Semisal berpapasan sama orang yg status hitam otomatis temen" & keluarga langsung hitam tapi ini enggak, mereka semua hijau dan saya sendiri yg hitam. Cp lewat tweet & dm ig ga dibales. Di email juga gabisa masuk karena email host kalian yg penuh dan gapernah kalian buka, sebaiknya aplikasi yg masih prematur seperti ini gausah dipakai. Toh juga banyak yg kena hitam trus pcr tetap hitam.

Terdapat kesalahan data pads penginoutan no hp di puskesmas tmpat vaksin namun tdk ada akses untuk komplain perubahan data. Itu data pribadi sy bisa di akses dgn mudah loh lewat link yg di kirimkan. Sedangkan mnghubungi 119 suliy sekali. (Edit) Sudah di hubungi 119 sibuk terus Sudah kirim email dgn ketentuan yg di sampaikan tidak ada respon. Ini hasil sertifikat vaksin orang dikirim orang lain! Mau di benerin susah amat! Respon nol! Kacau. Data orang salah alamat itu!! Data ktp saya ada disana!!

Aplikasi ini seharusnya ada layanan CSnya jadi pemilik akun bisa bertanya langsung mengenai covid-19 dan vaksin. Layanan seharusnya juga update dan terintegrasi dengan pihak2 terkait. Karena saya sudah mendapat 2x vaksin tapi status masih merah. Hanya karena sebelumnya saya sudah terdaftar di vaksin gotong royong tapi saya lebih memilih vaksin di pos rw dekat rumah karena pertimbangan jarak. Saya sudah email tapi tidak ada respond sampai dengan saat ini. Mohon bantuannya. Tks

Gimana ceritanya ya mau kemana mana kudu make aplikasi ini, tapi daftar akun aja gabisa. Minggu lalu saya mau daftar pas isi tanggal lahir gakbisa, hr ini kejadiannya sama. Padahal udah diulang kesekian kali, di uninstall install lagi sama aja. Coba deh bikin lebih bagusan, mau menanggulangi covid ceritanya tapi kok aplikasi rakyat kualitasnya setengah setengah.

Sejak pertama install app semua lancar walopun dalam hal konsumsi daya baterai sangat tinggi. Tetapi sejak update hari ini (1/4/21) selalu muncul peringatan "tidak ada koneksi internet" padahal koneksi internet normal dan aplikasi lain juga tidak ada masalah dengan koneksi internet. Harap segera diperbaiki karena diperlukan untuk melihat tiket dan sertifikat vaksin. Rating akan saya edit jika memang sudah lebih baik.

Maaf saya rasa ini cukup mengecewakan, saya sudah vaksin (lengkap 2 kali) dan ternyata Sertifikat Vaksinasi nya belum muncul juga, sudah 1 bulan saya menunggu, padahal saya juga mengisi form NIK dan data personal lain nya sesuai, mohon di perbaiki, karena saya benar2 butuh sertifikat vaksin untuk akses publik dan khawatir saya tidak bisa masuk hanya karena tidak ada sertifikat walaupun di aplikasinya sudah dinyatakan vaksin dua kali, mohon diperbaiki untuk masalah ini.

Kebayang nggak status merah, padahal sudah vaksin. Akhirnya ditolak masuk ke tempat-tempat yang harus scan apps ini. Sampai disaranin security mall buat update data. Setelah ditolak dari 3 tempat berbeda, saya telpon 119, diinfo ada kesalahan sistem. Pertanyaan saya, kenapa kalian nggak info ada kesalahan sistem ke tempat-tempat yang diwajibkan scan apps ini. Apa gunanya ada logo Kominfo di halaman utaman apps Pedulilindungi kalau kalian bahkan nggak tau cara komunikasi dengan benar.

Daftar aplikasi pake email, pas daftar vaksin masih diminta nomor telfon, saya kira kode otp akan dikirim ke nomor telfon. Ternyata otp dikirim ke email, setelah mengulangi proses kirim otp pas dimasukin malah "cannot marshal response payload" yang mana merupakan kesalahan yang cukup mendasar dalam penulisan program. Sungguh wadidaw sekali aplikasi ini, padahal saya sudah memberanikan diri untuk percaya pada aplikasi ini, setelah sebelumnya ada kebocoran data. Jadi ngeri anjir 🙈🙈🙈

punya nomor call center ga berguna, email ga berguna, sosmed ga berguna. cuma berguna kalo sukses aja, kalo ada masalah di penerbitan serti sampe telat sebulan dr tgl vaksin dan serti 2 belom terbit jangan harap bisa di respon. harus kita sendiri yang ke tempat vaksin, pedulilindungi yang ga peduli peduli amat untuk melindungi. apa gunanya warna indikator kuning hijau hitam kalo ada kasus masalah gini aja gak cepet responnya, mending kalo 1-3 hari. ini uda lebih dr 1 2 bulan

Buat yang kesulitan isi tanggal lahir coba buat dulu 'Frequent Pharases" Caranya klik kolom tgl lahir tahan sampai muncul copy/paste/Frequent Pharases. Klik Frequent Pharases trus klik tanda + dibagian bawah isi dengan format yyyy-mm-dd contoh : 2001-12-21. Klo udah klik back & klik n tahan lg kolom tgl lahir sampai muncul kembali copy/paste/Frequent pharases. Klo dah muncul klik Frequent Pharases & klik yg td dibuat di Frequent Pharases. Jangan lupa isi NIK & dll dulu, bakal gagal klo ga diisi.

Harusnya bisa lebih dipermudah dgn tidak perlu pakai aplikasi, barcode di sertifikat yg diprin/dicetak bisa digunakan, mengingat tidak semua orang punya smartphone dan mengerti caranya. Aplikasi ini jg ngeri banget, data bisa bocor.

Saya sudah vaksin ketika masih sekolah di Australia, sudah lapor via email sebulan lalu, tapi status vaksinasi saya masih merah. Karena lambannya perbaikan data disini saya jadi tidak bisa akses fasilitas publik. Akses GPS 24 jam juga bikin boros baterai !!!

Katanya klo ada yg perlu penjelasan bisa email..sya email berkali2 cm di bls akan kami tindak lanjuti..sampe skr g ada tindak lanjutnya..sertifikat vaksin kedua saya tdk muncul di aplikasi peduli lindungi,yg ada cm sertifikat vaksin pertama.sementara saya perlu utk kepentingan pekerjaan...payah.

Untuk apa sih aplikasi ini meminta akses lokasi kita SETIAP SAAT? cuma menghabiskan baterai saja, sudah gitu dipikir orang percaya dengan masalah privasi ini, mengingat belum lama ada ada data nasional yang bocor. Saya sih cuma izinkan sewaktu apps ini diperlukan saja, selebihnya dimatikan. Bikin repot saja, bodoh sekali.

Buruk! Stiap buka aplikasi slalu nuncul notifikasi lokasi buatan terdeteksi. Dsuruh buka kembali 5 mnit tp stelah lwt dr 5mnit ttp tdk bs! Pdhl aplikasi lain yg menggunakan gps baik2 aja. Di email ke support developer contact peduli lindungi pun tdk ada tanggapan!!

Gua uninstall setelah 5 menit, minta lokasi molo kayak spy ware. BOS, ABIS VAKSIN KITA DAPET SERTIFIKAT, bukan kita yg scan, tapi tempat2 public lah yg harus scan barcode kita. Kita cukup bawa gambar barcode vaksinasi doank.... Hadeh......

Banyak fungsi yg tidak/belum berfungsi, mau cek riwayat vaksin sama sertifikat saja harus entry NIK berkali2 (setiap mau cek/tampilkan riwayat atau sertifikat), padahal di akun sudah ada NIK dan nama, sudah tersimpan jelas. Masih jauh dari bagus. Semangat, perbaiki terus.

Kenapa setiap update harus input ulang data? Lalu skrg malah ga keluar sertifikat vaksinnya. Input NIK ga bs tekan tombol selanjutnya. Ternyata kalau login dengan menggunakan no hp bisa. jadi walau 1 NIK tapi daftar pakai email dan no hp maka aplikasi tidak melakukan auto merge data.

Mohon setting entry tanggal lahir di ubah supaya input bisa lebih cepat. Entry tanggal, bulan, dan tahun agar terpisah satu persatu entry, supaya yang lansia tidak capek pencet. Kalau usia 50 tahun, artinya perlu tekan entry 12x50 = 600x tekan tombol baru bisa selesai. Usia 80 = 12x80=960x tekan tombol.
1. tiap kali cek srtifikat harus masukin nama dn nik lg, pdhal sudh ad di profile. 2. akses media dn data (klo utk fto aj, kekny g prlu, yg pnting srtifikat) 3. aktif gps trus, etc
Tolong dong untuk pengisian tanggal lahirnya kasih langsung option hari , bulan dan TAHUN. Kelahiran tahun 1983 berarti harus klik 456 kali (12 x 38 ) gimana yang kelahiran 1970an...hadeuh...

Pake bahasa Indonesia aja ya kan ini apk utk orang Indonesia khusus nya. Ga ngerti siapa2 aja ahli IT dibalik pembuatan ni apk. Mo munculin sertipikat vaksin aja kagak muncul2 malah bolak balik ke bagian yg itu2 lagi, ga beres2, kan bikin naek darah!!! Trus harusnya kalow udah ketik no NIK kudu nya langsung muncul nama dong ga perlu ketik lagi nama, kok kalah canggihnya sama apk Traveloka??? Trus kok masukin data nama saya ga sesuai KTP, kok yah pake diangkat segala?? Ampunnn dijeyyy....sedih..

Saya sdh divaksin pertama dan kedua di februari... Vaksin ketiga jg dilakukan beberapa hari yg lalu. Surat vaksin tertulis juga ada. Lah tapi katanya ga pernah vaksin. Aplikasi minta no ktp tp ga bener databasenya... 🤷

Baca review sebelumnya yang punya masalah tidak bisa input tanggal lahir banyak. Jawabanya suruh email. Maaf ya....email juga percuma karena tidak dijawab juga. Malah ada di bawah Cs jawabnya pake cara masukinnya...ya ampun.... Petugas yang di mall Tang City Tangerang aja sampai bantu saya log in, relogin, ganti login pake email,trus no hp. Uninstal, reinstal. Tetep begitu dimasukin, klik ok, balik ke blank kosong lagi. Developernya dah tidak niat memperbaiki kah? Sewa tenaga ahli lah...

Passport dengan NIK tidak terkoneksi. Saya PCR diluar negeri sebelum waktu perjalanan pulang tidak ada dalam history PCR (padahal sudah upload foto nya). Waktu dalam karantina yang dipakai PCR adalah nomor passport yang kemudian juga tidak keluar dalam history PCR peduli lindungi. Apakah rekan rekan yang di vaksin Di luar negara bisa dapat fasilitas dari peduli lindungi?

Mau isi tanggal lahir gakbisa, ditambah kalau tahun lahirnya 1976 harus ngelik back satu" terus. Ini apps nggak membantu tapi malah menyulitkan. Tolong dong creator, appsnya di update lagi biar lebih praktis.

Saya sudah divaksin 2 dosis Pfizer di kantor di bulan Juni 2021, yg diimpor lgs dr kantor saya. Saya dapat kartu vaksin resmi dari CDC perwakilan Jakarta. Anehnya saya sudah kirim email ke sertifikat vaksin Peduli lindungi tapi tidak pernah dibalas smpe skrg. Telepon Call centernya sibuk teruuus abis itu ditutup. Apa ini salah saya jdnya saya tidak bisa update peduli lindungi saya? Bikin aplikasi kok gak serius, nyusahin orang tapi staff2nya pemalas gak mau repot merespon aduan masyarakat..

Udah brp kali daftar dan sy vaksin pun nama sy tetap tidak tercatat di peduli lindungi, di ketik NIK KTP malah yang tertera nama orang asing KIM HON...tolong admin update dan segera perbaiki data nya sesuai nama NIK KTP pasien vaksin

Appsnya sering tidak bisa scan di tempat tujuan dgn msg "radius scan terlalu jauh". Mau ngecek diary perjalanan pun jg statusnya muter terus walaupun posisi lokasi sdh nge-lock dan koneksi internet lancar.

Saya tidak bisa mengisikan tanggal lahir sehingga selalu tidak lengkap. Pengisian dari lab malam kemarin kesulitan karena masalah teknis sehingga keberangkatan pesawat saya pagi ini sulit sekali dikarenakan petugas hanya menerima dari akun. Padahal pihak rumah sakit telah menerangkan adanya maintenance dari peduli lindungan. Lama pengaksesan.

cara ngisi tanggal lahirnya pls diganti, masa iya ga bisa nulis manual. dikasi contoh aja format penulisan yg bener kek apa, pake slash kah atau pake strip. masa iya harus scroll sampe tanggal lahirnya ketemu baru di tap.

Sertifikat tidak kunjung muncul, suruh email dll sudah diemail juga nga ada tanggapan dan kebanyakan bounce back karena server bermasalah, telp 119 sampe berbulan2 juga cuma nada sibuk. Bikin applikasi dan kebijakan tolong selaraskan sama SDM dan kemampuan biar nga menyusahkan akhirnya.

Kurang mudah dipakai untuk menu pendaftaran vaksin karena selalu masuk ke menu pengecekan NIK. pendaftaran vaksin sangat buruk tanpa menjelaskan JENIS VAKSIN yang didapat tidak seperti pendaftaran pada aplikasi sejenis seperti halodoc dll. Badan kita adalah hak setiap individu jadi harusnya berhak tahu didaftarkan untuk merek apa. Meskipun untuk kormobid ada pilihan sesuai petunjuk dokter dan aplikasi tapi non kormobid juga berhak tahu merek apa yang didaftarkan aplikasi. BURUK SEKALI...!

Banyak sekali masalah yang ada di aplikasi ini. Pertama, Kenapa sih kita disuruh menulis nomor NIK saat pengambilan sertifikat padahal sebelumnya sudah mengisi nomor NIK. Kedua, Aplikasi ini terlalu bergantung pada GPS. Saya tau itu buat apa tapi tolong jangan dibuat ketika masuk dan keluar menu harus menyalakan GPS. UXnya tidak memuaskan dengan adanya paksaan untuk menyalakan GPS. Saya harap para Developer aplikasi ini dapat mempermudah akses di dalam aplikasi ini. Tidak ada gunanya jika aplikasi yang seharusnya membantu dalam layanan COVID tidak intuitif dan mudah untuk digunakan. PERBAIKI UI DAN UX NYA!

Aplikasinya gak support di Vivo Y12i. Terus udah vaksin dosis pertama tgl 7 september tapi sampe sekarang udh mau dosis ke 2 belom juga ada sertifikatnya. Sama lemot parah. Haduh. Padahal kan ini aplikasi yg harusnyabmemudahkan, tapi malah sebaliknya

Sdh mau vaksin dosis ke 2 pfizer sertifikat dosis 1nya blm keluar2. Lama amat, hrsnya kan langsung konek/cepat 2-3 hari kerja dah jd krn kita dah dpt QR Codenya di kartu vaksin yg diprint di selembar kertas selesai kita divaksin. Tgl 2 Sept kmrn vaksin di SMKN 26 Rawamangun.

Seharusnya kalau seseorang sudah positif, aplikasi PeduliLindung seharusnya tidak memperbolehkan yg bersangkutan jalan-jalan apalagi check-in ke tempat tertentu. Aplikasi lsg memberikan alert ke pihak gedung, atau tempat yg dikunjungin agar security melarang yang bersangkutan masuk. Jika masih berkeliaran juga (dari mobilitas), ditangkap aja untuk di isoman.

Scan QR terkadang keluar tulisan "anda berada diluar jangkauan", pdhl GPS udah aktif dan saya ada di dalam mall. Lain kali kalau buat app, mending di test dulu biar sempurna, baru release, jgn asal release tp banyak masalah terus update2 melulu. Mall jadi mengantri gara2 pada tdk bisa check in. Ngakak

Kalau bisa untuk profil kelengkapan mengenai tanggal lahir, untuk kalendernya lebih di efisienkan kembali. Dikarenakan, saya hendak melengkapi tanggal lahir milik orang tua saya tetapi mengklik backnya terlalu lama memakan waktu sehingga tidak efisien, apalagi tahun lahirnya mentok di 1972-an tiba2 blank warna putih. Sehingga harus kembali lagi mengulang dari awal, dan itu sangat melelahkan

Semoga terus diperbaikilah kinerja aplikasinya, supaya lbh stabil, ringan, bermanfaat dan efisien dlm pemakaian.

Saya pengguna baru apk ini krn sekarang jadi syarat wajib kalo mau berpergian & hangout bahkan ke supermaket di luar mall. Sayangnya experience pengguna benar2 mengecewakan, saya baru di tahap login & OTP saja sudah dibuat kesal. Klik kirim ulang kode lebih dari 10x tidak ada sms sama sekali, mendal terus & selalu muncul "Terjadi Kesalahan, ..." padahal koneksi internet saya stabil. Saran saja, kalau mau dijadikan syarat wajib, harusnya ditambah server & tim IT biar ngga down terus.

Aplikasi dijadiin andalan satu negeri seluas Indonesia yang penduduknya ratusan juta jiwa masih kayak begini. Mau scan QR gagal terus tulisannya melebihi radius padahal scan di tempat. Loginnya juga nyusahin pake nunggu dikirimin kode login padahal bisa pakai password aja. Paling malesin ya fitur locationnya yang nyala terus bikin boros baterai HP. Tracing orang tapi caranya gini amat. Mau matiin location juga app lain kayak ojol perlu location. Update dong protes2 penggunanya.

Penggunaan aplikasi peduli lindungi sudah cukup ada kemajuan. Tempat public sudah menyiapkan barcode. Tetapi belum semua menerapkan secara benar dan disiplin. Aparat mungkin belum benar sosialisasi kepada masyarakat. Saya masih menemui beberapa tempat yang tidak memasang barcode pada pintu masuk. Tetapi ditaruh didalam dan agak tidak terlihat. Sosialisasi harus lebih baik lagi dan perlu penekanan pentingnya barcode tersebut dan setiap pengunjung diminta senantiasa untuk selalu mescan sebelum msk

Jadi karena di perlukan sertifikat vaksin untuk keluar rumah dan perjalan jauh jadi terkendala. Sudah lebih dari setengah jam saya mencoba mendaftar tapi tetap saja tidak muncul nomer OTP yg dibutuhkan untuk menyelesaikan pendaftaran. Hal ini sangat merugikan saya. Saya mau komplain mengenai layanan vaksin karena ga tau mau harus kemana. Layanan vaksin disini jelek. Sertif vaksin1 saya tidak terdaftar dan setelah vaksin2 malah cuma dapet 1 sertif vaksin. Saya tanya saat vaksin2 malah disuruh kelayanan 119, setelah saya telpon disuruh ketempat vaksin yg katanya data diregis ulang. Setelah itu saya samperin tempat saya vaksin katanya ga bisa regis ulang, trus saya telpon 119 katanya harus nunggu sebulan buat regis lagi. Intinya skr saya hanya punya vaksin 1.

Selalu meminta perbaharui aplikasi. Sayangnya ketika diperbaharui, tidak ada perubahan atau perbaikan. Aplikasi ini tidak membantu bagi mereka yang tidak memiliki gawai karena susah untuk memasukkan akun lain untuk check-in. Mohon dibuat lebih ramah lagi soal sistemnya karena tidak semua orang memiliki gawai tersendiri sehingga perlu bantuan atau setidaknya menumpang dengan gawai orang lain.

Mau kasih masukan, untuk tab akun agar ditambahkan mode pendaftaran kartu vaksin keluarga. Orang tua saya meskipun sudah data aplikasi pedulilindungi sendiri, namun kadang lupa bawa hp, hpnya lowbat. Terima kasih Untuk eHac nya ketika penerbangan domestik tetap wajib isi negara asal, tanggal kedatangan dan tanggal keberangkatan. Mohon diperbaiki.
